quartet.translation[0].definitions[0].de: four singers or musicians who sing or play together
quartet.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a string quartet  (=four people playing musical instruments with strings, such as violins)
quartet.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a piece of music written for four performers
quartet.translation[0].definitions[2].de: four people or things of the same type
quartet.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: a quartet of short films set in the 1920s
